welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miami Shores, where the warm sunshine, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture await you. Get ready to experience the charm and energy of our city – we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Miami Shores has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, JetBlue, and Allegiant.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta, United, and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Spirit, Frontier, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Virgin Atlantic, British Airways, and Emirates.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must watch a short advertisement to access the network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
